Record.Term: Essential Minor Component of Pharmaceutical Excipient
Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Industrial Product/Industrial Aid/Pharmaceutical Excipient/Essential Minor Component of Pharmaceutical Excipient
Record.BroaderTerm: Essential Minor Component of Pharmaceutical Excipient
Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Synonym: Essential Minor Component of Drug Excipient
Essential Minor Component of Pharmaceutical Excipient
Record.Description: Any material present in a pharmaceutical excipient that is not the main chemical component or components, and is necessary for the excipient's proper performance during use.
